explains: n. 刺痛感；激动；（用于支撑窗户玻璃或石板瓦的）S 型金属固定夹片

sentences.en: The cold air made her face tingle.
sentences.cn: 冷空气冻得她的脸发痛。

sentences.en: I felt a sudden tingle of excitement.
sentences.cn: 我突然感到了一种强烈的兴奋。

sentences.en: Yes; but you gave him a good box on his ear that made it tingle!
sentences.cn: 是的，可是你给了他一记耳光，打得他耳朵疼！
